attributes.action: We demand a full Parliamentary debate on HS2
attributes.additional_details:
The true viability of the HS2 project and the desire of the electorate have not been properly investigated or considered.

We demand a full Parliamentary debate.

The Government is being disingenuous as it speaks unofficially of going ahead with HS2 and has begun negotiating with construction firms before the results of the Consultation have been reported.
